description: Time slice at year 2100 GeoMIP G7cirrus.
long_name: SSTs from year 2100 of SSP5-8.5; forcings and other prescribed conditions from year 2100 of G7cirrus
rationale: To assess radiative forcing of G7cirrus after 80 years of simulation.

requirements.description: Idealised temporal constraint, repeating 2100 for 10 years, to coincide with the final year of the ScenarioMIP SSP5-85 experiment
requirements.label: 2100-2101 10yrs100

requirements.description:
Add a local variable that replaces (in all locations where temperature is colder than 235K) the ice mass mixing ratio in the calculation of the sedimentation velocity with a value that is eight times the original ice mass mixing ratio.
Cirrus seeding to begin in 2020 and continue through to the year 2100.
requirements.keywords: GeoMIP, cirrus thinning, increase cirrus sedimentation velocity
requirements.label: IncreaseCirrusSedementationVelocity

requirements.description: 2100 sea surface temperature from the G7cirrus GeoMIP experiment.
requirements.label: G7cirrusSST2100

requirements.description: 2100 sea ice concentration from the G7cirrus GeoMIP experiment.
requirements.label: G7cirrusSIC2100

requirements.description:
Impose RCP8.5 forcing.
Represents the high end of the range of plausible future forcing pathways.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5
requirements.label: RCP85Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is made from the final year of the GeoMIP G7cirrus experiment
requirements.label: G7cirrusInitialisation

requirements.description: An Atmosphere only general circulation model configuration.
requirements.label: AGCM Configuration
